--- title: "Armadillo" engine: knitr ---
Armadillo is a linear algebra library for the C++ language. The `RcppArmadillo` package provides an interface from R to and from Armadillo by utilising the `Rcpp` package. We need to add these lines in the header of the `.cpp` file. ```c #include // [[Rcpp::depends(RcppArmadillo)]] ``` We can alternatively use the `RcppEigen` package, that uses the C++ `Eigen` library as a backend for linear algebra tasks. Both packages offer comparable features, making the choice between them a matter of personal preference. ## Additional resources * Armadillo [documentation](https://arma.sourceforge.net). * `RcppArmadillo` package [documentation](https://cran.r-project.org/web/packages/RcppArmadillo/index.html).
